bibl.title: Letter from Milton Hirschman to Philip Showalter Hench, December 12, 1941

div1.p: Hirschman offers a series of reports from the Department of Sanitation of the Isthmian Canal Commission to Hench.

div1.head: Letter from Milton Hirschman to Philip Showalter Hench, December 12, 1941
div1.opener:
LUTHER M
CORNWALL
COMPANY
723 ELEVENTH STREET N W · WASHINGTON D C · NATIONAL 4253
December 12, 1941
American·Government·Publications·Choice Books
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Would you be interested in the following:
REPORT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF SANITATION OF THE
ISTHMIAN CANAL COMMISSION.
January 1908 to January 1910, inclusive.
Monthly reports, 25 in all, prepared
by Dr. W.C. Gorgas. The Annual Report
for 1909 is included, making 26 pieces.
Price for lot, delivered . . . . . . $12.50
It will be a pleasure to serve you.
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, LUTHER M. CORNWALL CO.
Milton Hirschman Law Books-- New and Used
